amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 117-381 to clarify that when applicable, federal surveys should gather information from a knowledgeable proxy of a deceased LGBTQI+ individual.
amendment.purpose: Amendment clarifies that when applicable, federal surveys should gather information from a knowledgeable proxy of a deceased LGBTQI+ individual.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney, Carolyn B. amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 213 - 201 (Roll no. 294).
